cs-fix-changes: updated_files=$(echo $(git diff --name-only `git merge-base origin/main HEAD` | grep php)); if [ -n "$updated_files" ]; then phpcbf $(echo $updated_files); phpcs $(echo $updated_files); else echo "No modified .php files for PHPCS."; fi;

scripts-descriptions.cs-fix-changes: Automatically fix coding standards issues in files changed since the main branch.
scripts-descriptions.cs-fix: Automatically fix all coding standards issues where possible.
